body_html:
Humm we have been testing for that incompatible change and upstreaming several fixes to lot of projects including tensorflow. We have also got a green build from Tensorflow team with 0.6.0rc. I would be interested in knowing how those breakage have not been caught during release testing.

There is a flag to deactivate that behavior to ensure people can use Bazel 0.6 until the problem is fixed. /Cc @vladmos who can say more about that.

There is a flag to deactivate that behavior to ensure people can use Bazel 0.6 until the problem is fixed. /Cc @vladmos who can say more about that.
body:
Humm we have been testing for that incompatible change and upstreaming several fixes to lot of projects including tensorflow. We have also got a green build from Tensorflow team with 0.6.0rc. I would be interested in knowing how those breakage have not been caught during release testing.


There is a flag to deactivate that behavior to ensure people can use Bazel 0.6 until the problem is fixed. /Cc @vladmos who can say more about that.
